document_data.name: Dye Remover
document_data.mainbody: '''Dye remover''' was a commonly used substance that stripped all [[dye]]s from metals, leather, and cloth, used in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Commercially sold dye remover found throughout the [[Chionthar Valley]] and the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] was a secret recipe that included a ''[[universal solvent]]''. The substance was first created by a certain [[hedge witch]] long before the {{YearlinkName|1492}}.
document_data.Notable Users:
*[[Araj Oblodra]], a [[drow]] alchemist, allied with the [[Cult of the Absolute]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
*[[Arron]], a [[halfling]] [[druid]] trader from the [[Emerald Grove]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
*[[Barcus Wroot]], a [[deep gnome]] who was on a quest to find his friend [[Wulbren]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
*[[Figaro Pennygood]], a merchant from [[Facemaker's Boutique]] of Baldur's Gate in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
